title: This (Renewed) Dyson V7 Vacuum Is the Cheapest We’ve Ever Seen
text:
1 item in this article 1 item on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

If you’ve been longing to get your hands on a statusy cordless Dyson vacuum, now’s a good day to do it, because this Dyson V7 is on-sale at Amazon for just $180. That’s the cheapest we’ve ever seen this model, which, to be fair, isn’t the newest Dyson on the market. But the V7 still works like a tornado to quickly suck up any dirt, dust, dander, or hair that might be covering your floors and furniture, no cords required.

One caveat: This Dyson is “renewed,” but that doesn’t mean it’s “used.” Instead, this preowned vacuum has been inspected by the folks at Dyson to ensure it works properly and doesn’t show too much cosmetic wear, if any. Plus, it comes with a six-month warranty in case something does go wrong. It’s also a Dyson vacuum under $200, which is as good a deal as you’re ever going to get.

Dyson V7 Motorhead HEPA Cordless Vacuum (Renewed) $180 (was $250, now 28% off) $180 at Amazon Buy

description: The Dyson V7 Motorhead HEPA Cordless Vacuum (Renewed) is on sale at Amazon for just $180, 28 percent off the list price of $250 (and 35 percent off the price of a brand-new V7 vacuum).
